definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the effect of Kaisailu on urinary retention induced by intra-vertebral canal anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討開塞露治療椎管內麻醉術後尿瀦留的療效。

sentences.english: The Effect of Nursing Intervention on Improvement of Anxiety and Depression in DM Patients;
sentences.chinese: 目的探討酚妥拉明治療產後尿瀦留的護理干預效果。

sentences.english: Both of them obviously improved the status of water-sodium retention.
sentences.chinese: 坎離煎和開搏通均能明顯改善心衰兔水鈉瀦留狀態。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the mechanism responsible for sodium retention in experimental nephrotic rats.
sentences.chinese: 確定阿黴素腎病大鼠內髓集合管鈉瀦留的機制。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the main points of caring patients with retention of urine after the operations of archosyrinx and haemorrhoids.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結痔瘻手術後患者尿瀦留的護理要點。

sentences.english: Compared the improving conditions of Pos-op Urine Retention Symptom between them.
sentences.chinese: 對照組採用耳穴貼壓的方法解除尿瀦留。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the ultrasound feature of rudimentary uterus and the retention of menstruation in uterus cavity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討殘角子宮並宮腔經血瀦留的超聲特徵。

sentences.english: AIMS To investigate the relationship between the liver function- al impairment and sodium and water retention.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究肝功能損害與鈉水瀦留的關係。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of acupoints moxibustion to treat postoperative patients with urine retention after accepting craniocerebral operation.
sentences.chinese: 觀察腧穴熱敏化艾灸治療顱腦術後病人尿瀦留的效果。

sentences.english: Limit salt and salty foods to reduce bloating and fluid retention.
sentences.chinese: 少喫鹹食，限制食鹽攝入，來緩解腫脹和液體瀦留。

sentences.english: Methods:Nursing intervention from 70 cases of cervical cancer with retention of urine.
sentences.chinese: 對宮頸癌術後尿瀦留70例患者進行護理干預。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of neostigmine on postoperative dysuria.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察新斯的明用於術後尿瀦留的效果及其副作用。
